Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Safety Critical
b) Defect Observed: Fuselage skin crack propagation. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Electromagnetic interference affecting sensor accuracy
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fuselage Assembly component. Analysis
of operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Issue technical bulletin to all operators
d) Attributable Code: F - Failure/ageing/Corrosion/Material Failure
Remarks: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate.
Date: 25/06/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia
